Once More Unto The Breach

01 January 2015

Once more unto the breach, dear friends, once more;
Or close the wall up with our English dead.
In peace there's nothing so becomes a man
As modest stillness and humility:
But when the blast of war blows in our ears,
Then imitate the action of the tiger;

    • About Me

    I'm a student studying Computer Games Technology at Abertay University in Dundee, Scotland. This Blog/Site is intended to allow me to share my ramblings, findings and act as a portfolio of my work throughout my studies and beyond.
